channel.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_LoadBalancer_Global on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_LoadBalancer_Global on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_LoadBalancer_Global
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_LoadBalancer_Global Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_LoadBalancer_Global data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer billing item whose item category code is ‘global_load_balancer’ Local allowCancellationFlag Flag to check if a billing item can be cancelled. 1 = yes. 0 = no. Type: integer associatedBillingItemId This is sometimes populated for orphan billing items that are not attached to servers. Billing items like secondary portable IP addresses fit into this category.
